text: Ara isara'ilera bansadharadera amara abasya'i uttama abasabhumite basabasa karalama, ara tadera amara uttama bisayabastu diye jibikadana karalama, ara tara bibheda srsti kare ni ye paryanta na tadera kache jnana ela. Nihsandeha tomara prabhu kiyamatera dine tadera madhye bicara karabena se-sanbandhe yate tara matabheda karechila.
